commit_list.repo_description: Easily configure multipath routing under Linux
Easily configure multipath routing under Linux
Easily configure multipath routing under Linux

commit_list.message: Prefer Twofish as it has a larger block size.

Adding minecraft service.

* Use softlimit to manage potential memory issues.
* Use multilog to maintain logs.

git config --global core.editor /usr/bin/vim
Base64encode random bits before salting. So there.
SALT is now randomly generated per user.
End of passion play, crumbling away
Add memory protection; increase default cache to 1G
Good progress; moving to FreeBSD as primary platform.
Add sanity checking to shell scripts
genUser script should default to account immediate disable once password expires
Minor changes; print username on connect
Adding system scripts, shell and cfg
Fixoring authorized_keys, adjustment for ALTQ queues.

Added hardening script and authorized keys example to restrict tunnel
options. We want to avoid, and have a layered defense, against anything
but Dynamic forwards.
Alter default ciphers for improved performance
Adding staging script to move cfg
First draft of genUser script; adding cfg for single purpose SMTP daemon
Throttle is 50 requests per second per client IP. So there.
No, really, I want that indented

Adding sanity checks for expected API calls; limit respond_to method for
our commonly accessed calls.

Adjust overall protection settings; move number validation to ensure
JSON/XML path functions.
Increase throttle limits; should be stop-gap only.
Derp; RedisToGo should use default DB

Redis instance should specify database; default to db '16'.

The default redis configuration allows for 16 database, so we'll opt for
the the end range.

Enhance logging facilities. We have two log paths; one with detailed
information and one providing a counter for API hits.
No longer using the PUB/SUB model for logging.
Adding sane feedback for Nexmo SMS action.

Remove redis "dev" namespace (no longer needed); drop dev_match
function.

Remove unsued functions such as email; simplify dev key matches.

We no longer worry about development API keys; instead we will
associate a development phone number for such the client will not be
charged as a transaction.
Remove pony dependency and associated functions

Adding Nexmo functionality.

SMS flow attempts to send SMS vua Nexmo first, then Twilio if there is
any failure.
Stripping out unneeded client_url functions; fixes for dev SMS function.

Removing 'client_url' output(s) - we already provide a token validation
path; simple is better.

Adding dev_key check which allows for SMS only to single defined phone
number.
Cleanup and staging for Heroku push.
Drop req. for HAML and cookies; add verbiage to expired key display.

Optimized Redis query; improve logging.
Check for non-expiration of Redis key; this confirms customer exists as
well as the status (eliminates a superfluous query). Non-SMS calls
now properly record '0' as the phone number.

token & client URL's now support trailing slashes; issue 302's
for unknown requests (Chrome is too cachey with 301's)

Adding more detail to successful SMS message; now includes validation
URL.
Funnel customers to www.toofactor.com/contact/ where needed.

Redirect to customer site for unknown requests; added kinder language
for invalid API key requests; email callback now includes token_url for
easier usage by developer.
Slight change to language for unknown API key request.
SMS messages should provide enough information to verify the token.
Trailing slash now should be handled correctly.
erb layouts within halt declarations must be wrapped.
Import some styles from Customer site
Fixed SMS function; custom expiration problems.
Playing with erb for quick streamlining
Playing with erb for quick streamlining

Adding index.erb to provide some information if root is accidently
accessed. Needs to be Nick'd
Shouldn't rescue exceptions; plain jane is fine.

Jobber now understands shared Redis instance; no longer craps it's pants
if it cannot connect to Redis.

Status messages should have some readable output; move from straight
status to halt.
Heroku prep; change listening port to 80

Need one view for XML formatting, adding jobber.rb for polling
subscribed Redis channels (stashing it here)
Twilio to handle phone number validation

Mailed tokens now include Timezone information for expiration times
(America only for now)
Redis namespacing complete; cleaner formatting for expiration times in email
Added expired time to generated email tokens.
Pony works; but seems to block (maybe look into thread instead).
Check for expiration before processing API call
Drop put and post verbs to the floor
Removing HAML views; API site doesn't produce pretty output
Convert XML output to use view template
Add builder template view for XML
Use Sinatra base for JSON generation.
Clean up timestamps; no need for that precision. Add token URL to json output.
Break out sinatra app as standalone driver
Adding silly inline see for redis
Shell script for seeind redis, both for current and hash-based customer records

Add client_url check; we return 200 for valid (non-expired) PURL
requests, 406 for expired/non-valid requests.
Basic cleanup; maddness switching from TextMate to vim
Adding Notes with seed instructions and random stuff
Adding placeholders for needed views, removed old node.js redis monitor; db directory for Redis seed.
Fixed non-prefixed URL requests to default to JSON output; moved output to discrete function. So there.
Removing base URL stanza; no need for a specific match for that area.
Playing around a bit with some views
Switching to using splat instead of manual regex
Layering in Twilio support for sending auth tokens via SMS
Fix xml_token now that we use a stronger hash
HMAC change for client URL generation
Pulled out rescue traps for debugging -- this is the stable branch for now
Added shotgun to Gemfile for dev purposes.
Adding redis increment for access; need to rethink Redis schema
Got around to creating a proper Gemfile
Folding in recommendations from sinatra-recipes; added error handling.
Adding bootstrap stuff (Hi Nick), cleanup Gemfile
Rescure wrapping, added HAML for root, updated Gemfile
Added sane output channels via URL suffix; JSON and XML now workie.
Added rack config, some HAML for your YAML
Layered in sinatra; testimg regex route capture
Testing ruby version of token generation.
Testing and cleanup -- redis lookups still problematic
Break out tokenize function from lookup; considering using Express as the underlying framework.
Function for creating random hex complete, adding Redis client.
Swap out instances of 'sys' with 'util' (node version bump).
Replace master branch with page content via GitHub

repo_list.description: Easily configure multipath routing under Linux
Munin plugin for Redis. Monitors lots of things, with few depencies (pure redis-cli + awk)
